Anyone know why builders at Mitcham Bridge are dumping waste into the River Wandle? I recorded this today at 3:15. #wandle @EnvAgencySE  @EnvAgency @riverlevel_2135 @Merton_Council https://t.co/czmoLpKGHd

To be straight the reason our sewage system is failing is down to crumbling infrastructure, failure to enforce regulations, insufficient investment and poor governance. @DefraGovUK , @EnvAgency, @Ofwat , @WaterUK  stand up and take bow.

@AaronBell4NUL @MattHancock @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids Takes your breath away.  Take control and get it closed now.  It's an environmental catastrophe, damaging the health and wellbeing of thousands of people.  Could this be coming to a town near you next?  Get it done.  PM says it's been going on long enough, we'll have to sort it.

tweets.text: @DanielHewittITV We too are being forgotten! #walleysquarry has no gas management!Toxic landfill gas is being released into the air and filling up homes,schools &hospitals!12k+ complaints to @EnvAgency & it’s getting worse!We need evacuating too!Help us @itvnews #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/AEUoqJHiph

Started 2 regular inhalers for my asthma 4 wks ago,now starting Montelukast tonight to stop my airways from narrowing when the fumes come.All since the fumes came to our area.What does that tell you @phe? @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency https://t.co/KmvXNqxaiZ

A bit of #TLC in Rossendale. This footage (from January) shows leaky stone dams slowing the flow of water from the moors into the River Irwell. We worked with @EnvAgencyNW @NTGawthorpe @DefraGovUK @unitedutilities to build 400 dams on Holcombe Moor and Musden Head Moor #NFM https://t.co/dOGdePZDqD

Now this is the story all about how
My life filled with stink, turned upside down
And I'd like to take a minute, just sit right there
I'll tell you how we long for a town with clean air! #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @PHE_uk #shameonREDINDUSTRIES #REDINDUSTRIES #landfill

Report report report. The @EnvAgency ignored the complaints for a long time. The power is in our numbers - they cannot get away with ignoring 700 calls in an afternoon /evening from people breathing in hydrogen sulphide. Keep it going, report every time you smell it @BBCPanorama https://t.co/gvqiPcVSPw

If you were flooded out tomorrow she’d be there with the press for a photo opportunity shaking hands with whoever patting them on the back claiming they are wonderful and here for the community in a crisis donning her hard hat 🤬🤬

@pvfc_carol please can you use your influence to help our #stopthestink campaign? I know you care about people suffering in the community and hundreds in NUL are on their knees and desperate for help. @EnvAgency and @RedIndustries2 need to take urgent action
Hi @SimonTagg, has the @EnvAgency shared any data from the monitoring units at #walleysquarry with #nulbc yet? #stopthestink

Westlands is full of landfill gas again, starting to smell it in the house again so likely in for another night of health effects & no sleep. Shame on you @EnvAgency and your duplicity in this outrage on our health. Shame on you @PHE_EoEngland for not protecting our health
@Vig79 @EnvAgency @riverlevel_2135 @Merton_Council Thanks Ian. We are aware of the issue and have visited the site. If anyone sees any pollution into rivers please report it on 0800 807060

Our team at Hebden Bridge FAS supported The Calder Community Cares Easter Appeal, volunteering 6 days including Good Friday & Easter Saturday and donating:
- 350 Easter Eggs
- COVID19 Safe Materials – Gloves, Masks, Gels and Aprons
- Food 
- 300 Bunches of Daffodils
@EnvAgencyYNE https://t.co/DaEc6A6Mlg

I have no pre existing conditions and sometimes after a bad night I wake up with my lungs burning! #stopthestink https://t.co/mbKE9wZiIt

tweets.text: Hi @PHE_WestMids @EnvAgencyMids can we be real here? Residents exposure times are hours, not minutes, and repeatedly for at least 2 years. Can you accurately still say there’s no harm to human health? P.S how do you sleep at night? Because we can’t.😴 #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/Y2RMaMkmJW

💨So the wind direction swings around again and the south & west of the Borough get the brunt of the stink this evening. The operator is now halfway to @EnvAgencyMids deadline to reduce the odours without any success. What is the EA’s plan B? @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL https://t.co/5Ssb90uU4h

Simple question @EnvAgencyMids. Why are you not monitoring air quality inside our homes? Our exposure times to the #walleysquarry gases are far longer than anything your MMF is picking up, due to the gases getting trapped in our homes whilst we sleep. #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/PrywMHIhJg
@EnvAgency @BostonBarrierEA @johncurtinEA Fantastic teams? Still waiting on the water samples to be tested from your fantastic teams!

Developer @lb_Southwark* are lawlessly building without permission on Rye Hill Park estate*. @ThamesWater* have not ok'ed build. This is a landslip/flood zone* Southwark are putting residents at risk!  @Southwark_News @SthLondonPress @EnvAgency @PeckhamVision https://t.co/XpNduzlbPX

Trying to have some time to myself now my child’s in bed.

3months pregnant also and having to deal with the stink in my own home. Where is my HUMAN RIGHT to clean, fresh air? There is no escape. 
#stopthestink 

@StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC https://t.co/FhlAS7fzWz

tweets.text: Reported the landfill stench to @EnvAgency again, filling my home, all windows/doors closed. This means no sleep for me or my partner who is a key worker and gets off shift at 3am. Disgusting. You need to resolve this. It is unbearable @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL #stopthestink

@EnvAgencyMids #StopTheStink when are you going to stop my house being gassed from walleys landfill silverdale you have had weeks and i see no change in the gas coming into my house and destroying our lives

My mother-in-law has just been to get my baby out of her cot. I hear a shout - 'it stinks of gas up here'. That'll be the landfill - obviously I have become used to the smell. THIS. IS. WRONG. #HumanRights #StopTheStink 
@AaronBell4NUL @ClareDinnisEA @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency
